title: Kahi shows off post-baby body | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Kahi shows off post-baby body By KpopJoA 10 minutes ago 2,206 140 0 0 Google+ On February 6, singer Kahi posted a photo of her slender post-baby body on her Instagram page.
She posted, "My pants finally fit now," and shared a photo of herself holding up a victory sign smiling. In a casual t-shirt and skinny jeans, Kahi's body looks as fit as her After School days. She previously revealed she's been working on her figure soon after her son's birth . 
Kahi married businessman Mr. Yang last March and gave birth to a healthy baby boy in October. YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
